title: Is Playing Ranked Drunk/High A Punishable Offense?
body: And if it isn't, why not?

replies.body:
Is it a dick move? Yes.

Is it punishable? No. Why? It can't be proven. If they are doing something like intentionally feeding or flaming, that is punishable whether they are intoxicated or not.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uya04UnW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-10T04:45:42.483+0000)
>
> Is it punishable? No. Why? It can't be proven.

Fuck that. It's not punishable because it's none of your damn business.
Uh, it might not be none of our business, but you could at least be courteous and go to norms if you do want to play League whilst being high or drunk.

> [{quoted}](name=AnonymousPoro,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uya04UnW,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-10T16:28:58.066+0000)
>
> Uh, it might not be none of our business, but you could at least be courteous and go to norms if you do want to play League whilst being high or drunk.

Or **it is** none of your damn business. You could at least worry about your own damn business.
Why are you being so disrespectful? I thought we were all supposed to keep an open mind and love each other?
Try it before you buy it.

**It is** my business when it's affecting me.  I don't have a problem with drinking or getting high, but if you do, play normals.  I'd rather lose a norm and be a little salty than lose a ranked and possibly face demotion.

Oh boo hoo you lose a video game. If you couldn't carry you don't deserve the rank.

Have you ever had to pee in a cup?

It doesn't matter if I lose the game, it matters when it affects my ELO.  And how tf am I supposed to carry a drunk or high person as a support main?  That's hard enough by itself with someone sober, but in Bronze Elo?
Wow. You sure are getting angry.
Okay, thanks.  I was a little salty off making this post, mainly because I had lost two ranked games in a row thanks to two teammates who claimed to be high.
i ve seen my friends get pentas after taking shots of vodka so no not really
